channel.title: Necroits: Post (Special Announcement) 96 slots survival 1.2.5
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.hgsitebuilder.com/files/writeable/uploads/hostgator101909/image/necroitspostbigbanner.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt]THE SERVER IS 1.2.5[/size] Get a 1.2.5 download here [url=http://necroits.info/downloads]http://necroits.info/downloads[/url][/center]
ANNOUNCEMENT: Here's some good news. AN EVENT! GOLD ACCOUNT GIVE AWAY!!! Thats Right. Im gonna be on from 7:30PM EST -5 to about 10PM EST -5... That means that you have 5 whole hours! For what? To be the pioneers of post! First of the after! The Alpha after the Omega! THE GOLD ACCOUNTS! Thats right, the 10$ Gold accounts I am giving away for free for whoever joins during the 5 hours I, Nizura being ONLINE! Dont miss out because GOLD accounts! They get more stuff now and will get more stuff soon! MORE HERO CLASSES TOWNY CONTROLE SPECIAL PLUGIN USES IT WILL SOON BE GODLY (-hint hint- for all those who played during the reign of Lalilah) Psst it already started!
The event will continue for the rest of the week at random times... when NIZURA is online.
